item.description:
Hi All,

come join me at my condo in Brookline for our first ever Book club and pot luck. When you RSVP please let me know what you will be bringing so I can plan accordingly. The first book we will be reading is In Defense of Food an Eaters Manifesto written by Michael Pollan.



hope to see you there,

Katie

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Book club/ pot luck
